item.title: Random amout of money - help!
item.dc:creator: @ryan1322 ryan1322
item.description:
@ryan1322 wrote:

case 375: addItem(995, 1000000 + misc.random(999999); } break;
ok 375 is a chest and i want to make it give random amount of money above 1m, but it gives me errors so can someone explain how to make random amount of an item give with misc.random.

-thanks
